member.name: T:MedicApi.Swashbuckle.SwaggerExampleValue
member.summary: A custom attribute for setting default parameter values in Swagger. Decorate the desired API endpoint '[SwaggerExampleValue(name, value)]'.

member.name: T:MedicApi.Swashbuckle.AddExampleValues
member.summary: A Swashbuckle filter that applies the default values. Add 'c.OperationFilter/' to AddSwaggerGen in Startup
